source.sqlReaderQuery:
select Source_count as Source_Count, Target_Count from dbo.etl_audit_log where batch_id = (select max(batch_id)
from dbo.etl_audit_log where Activity_Name = 'SPRC_Internal_Dim_Calendar_day')

activities.name: Check for Src to Tgt match

body.MessageBody2: This is an email notification generated from Azure Data Factory for data ingestion in Calendar Day dim (dbo.calendar_day_dim) table.
